SEARCH
Package controller

Class AppointmentController

java.lang.Object
controller.AppointmentController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AppointmentController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Class that contains event handlers, controller methods, and logical implementation for validation and creating / updating / deleting appointments.

  • Constructor Details

    • AppointmentController

      public AppointmentController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes appointment fxml file. Initializes values in combo boxes for times and ID's. If modifying an appointment, loads appropriate values into text fields.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - Location of fxml file this controller controls behavior of, provided by FXMLLoader.
      resourceBundle - Used for localization and resource loading, provided by FXMLLoader.

    • initializeComboBoxes

      void initializeComboBoxes()
      Logic used to initialize options in time combo boxes, and ID combo boxes.

    • onSaveAction

      void onSaveAction()
      Used when save button is pressed on form. First checks information entered in text fields, and checks if combo boxes were selected. If no appointment is selected, will create a new record / row in database, and a new appointment class object. If an appointment is selected, will modify and update the information of the existing appointment.

    • isValidAppointment

      boolean isValidAppointment()
      Used to check information entered in form. Checks for empty text fields. Validates time selections, checks if in business hours, or if date is scheduled on weekend. Checks for overlapping appointments for the same customer.
      Returns:
      true if appointment is valid, false otherwise.

    • onCancelAction

      void onCancelAction()
      Used when cancel button is pressed on form. Shows an alert to user explaining that information entered will not be saved. Changes scene back to home screen if user confirms they want to cancel changes.

    • switchToHomeScene

      void switchToHomeScene() throws IOException
      Used to transition current scene back to home scene. Will load "Home.fxml" using FXMLLoader as the scene for the primary stage.
      Throws:
      IOException - Occurs if there is a problem locating or loading the fxml file.
